turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about 1944 Bombay explosion.
turn.1: What were the effects of the 1944 Bombay explosion?
turn.3: What happened to the people who lost their jobs?
turn.4: It was estimated that about 6,000 firms were affected and 50,000 lost their jobs.
turn.5: Was anyone helped or offered any compensation?
turn.6: The government took full responsibility for the disaster and monetary compensation was paid to citizens who made a claim for loss or damage to property.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: During periodical dredging operations to maintain the depth of the docking bays, many intact gold bars have been found, some as late as February 2011, and returned to the government.
turn.10: A live shell weighing 45 kg (100 lb) was also found in October 2011.
turn.12: The Mumbai Fire Brigade's headquarters at Byculla has a memorial built in the memory of the numerous fire fighters who died.
